remarks: Lemma for Pigeonhole Principle.  A natural number is equinumerous to its successor minus one of its elements.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-1998.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)
statement:
phplem2.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
phplem2.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
phplem2 $p |- ( ( A e. _om /\ B e. A ) -> A ~~ ( suc A \ { B } ) ) $.
